org.osmdroid.bonuspack.utils
Class DouglasPeuckerReducer

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.bonuspack.utils.DouglasPeuckerReducer

public class DouglasPeuckerReducer
extends java.lang.Object

Reduces the number of points in a shape using the Douglas-Peucker algorithm.
From: http://www.phpriot.com/articles/reducing-map-path-douglas-peucker-algorithm/4
Ported from PHP to Java. "marked" array added to optimize.

Author:
M.Kergall

reduceWithTolerance

public static java.util.ArrayList<org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint> reduceWithTolerance(java.util.ArrayList<org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint> shape,
                                                                                  double tolerance)
Reduce the number of points in a shape using the Douglas-Peucker algorithm

Parameters:
shape - The shape to reduce
tolerance - The tolerance to decide whether or not to keep a point, in the coordinate system of the points (micro-degrees here)
Returns:
the reduced shape

orthogonalDistance

public static double orthogonalDistance(org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint point,
                                        org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint lineStart,
                                        org.osmdroid.util.GeoPoint lineEnd)
Calculate the orthogonal distance from the line joining the lineStart and lineEnd points to point

Parameters:
point - The point the distance is being calculated for
lineStart - The point that starts the line
lineEnd - The point that ends the line
Returns:
The distance in points coordinate system
